name: Tell a friend
flavorText: Congrats! You told someone you’re making a human.

name: First Doctor’s Appointment
flavorText: Now a doc’s in the mix. Joy!

name: Cat’s Out of the Bag
flavorText: Welp, looks like people know now.

name: Paparazzi
flavorText: Someone took a picture of your spawn. Just thought you should know before the press gets it.

name: Finished First Trimester!
flavorText: Congrats! You’ve made it one third of the way there.

name: LIES!
flavorText: Someone lied to keep the secret. Good friend? Good liar?

name: It's Alive!
flavorText: You felt Rex kick. Just wait for the teeth to come in.

name: Giving Up
flavorText: Drop something? Want to ride a bike? Feel like shaving your legs? Ha.

name: Pink or Blue?
flavorText: Which color will be in vogue this year? Congrats on finding out!

name: Name-Caller
flavorText: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but a name probably wouldn’t hurt.

name: Finished Second Trimester!
flavorText: Congrats! You’ve made it two thirds of the way there.

name: I lost my toes!
flavorText: You won’t need to see them for a while anyway.

name: Emotions Win.
flavorText: Cry at a commercial? Yeah, we do too.

name: Pregnancy Classes
flavorText: Being an alien host is hard. Good thing there are classes.

name: But I NEED it.
flavorText: Go for a late-night cravings run.

name: Sympathy Belly
flavorText: Good job. You wore a sympathy belly—like a good husband.

name: Finished Second Trimester!
flavorText: Congrats! You’ve made 2/3 of a human.

name: Pop it out!
flavorText: No way! That baby breathes air!
